ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... not necessarily, because druids and necros are much easier to play and have the perception of being great soloers, whereas bards are hard to play, appear
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:30 AM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
>hehe if we're so overpowered why is it there's only 2 bards in my guild
>above 30? being me at 50 and another at 56? Sure we have a couple twinks in
>the teens and 20's but that's just that, a twink... Well one of em might be
>leveling up to 50+ since his necro is 60. If we'd be so overpowered the
>populations would be like that of a druid or necro soloers...
>
>Minkin 50 bard
>RIP
>Ayonae Ro

not necessarily, because druids and necros are much easier to play and have the
perception of being great soloers, whereas bards are hard to play, appear to be weak
if you don't know what you're doing, and have the perception of being overly reliant
on a group. also there's that 15-22 gap where you really don't get much in the way
of songs and other melee classes are getting defensive and offensive skills where
most people give up being a bard. plus a lot of people playing the game want to have
a clear effect, i.e. my spell did XXX damage, my heal healed XXX damage, which is the
type of feedback bards rarely get.
